title: Side Effects of an Educator: Valenciá De’La Clay-Bell
description:
This week we launch our Educator series with Valenciá De’La Clay-Bell (IG @v.d.c.b), and talk about how she went from being a D student to being a teacher fueled by activism.
~
Get tickets to The Black Outside Again Tour! amandaseales.com/tourdates
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/amandaseales)!
~
